an4.27:1.1: “Cattarimani, bhikkhave, appani ca sulabhani ca, tani ca anavajjani.
an4.27:1.3: Pamsukulam, bhikkhave, civaranam appanca sulabhanca, tanca anavajjam.
an4.27:1.4: Pindiyalopo, bhikkhave, bhojananam appanca sulabhanca, tanca anavajjam.
an4.27:1.5: Rukkhamulam, bhikkhave, senasananam appanca sulabhanca, tanca anavajjam.
an4.27:1.6: Putimuttam, bhikkhave, bhesajjanam appanca sulabhanca, tanca anavajjam.
an4.27:1.7: Imani kho, bhikkhave, cattari appani ca sulabhani ca, tani ca anavajjani.
an4.27:1.8: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appena ca tuttho hoti sulabhena ca, idamassaham annataram samannanganti vadamiti.
